text: Uss kay sath do aur jawan bhi qaid khanay mein dakhil huye inn mein say aik ney kaha kay mein ney khuwab mein apney aap ko sharab nichortay dekha hai aur doosray ney kaha mein ney apney aap ko dekha hai kay mein apney sir per roti uthaye huye hun jisay parinday kha rahey hain humen aap iss ki tabeer batiye humen to aap khoobiyon walay shaks dikhaee detay hain
